014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect;
015
016import java.beans.ConstructorProperties;
017import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
018import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
019import java.lang.reflect.Parameter;
020import java.sql.ResultSet;
021import java.sql.SQLException;
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023import java.util.Comparator;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Map;
026import java.util.Optional;
027import java.util.OptionalInt;
028import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
029import java.util.stream.Stream;
030
031import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.Nested;
032import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.PropagateNull;
033import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.RowMapper;
034import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.RowMapperFactory;
035import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.SingleColumnMapper;
036import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.internal.PojoMapper;
037import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
038import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.Qualifiers;
039import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
040
041import static java.lang.String.format;
042
043import static org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.JdbiConstructors.findFactoryFor;
044import static org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ReflectionMapperUtil.anyColumnsStartWithPrefix;
045import static org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ReflectionMapperUtil.findColumnIndex;
046import static org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ReflectionMapperUtil.getColumnNames;
047
048/**
049 * A row mapper which maps the fields in a result set into a constructor. The default implementation will perform a
050 * case insensitive mapping between the constructor parameter names and the column labels,
051 * also considering camel-case to underscores conversion.
052 * <p>
053 * This mapper respects {@link Nested} annotations on constructor parameters.
054 * <p>
055 * Constructor parameters annotated as {@code @Nullable} may be omitted from the result set without
056 * error. Any annotation named "Nullable" is respected--nay, worshipped--no matter which package it is from.
057 */
058public class ConstructorMapper<T> implements RowMapper<T> {
059    private static final String DEFAULT_PREFIX = "";
060
061    @SuppressWarnings("InlineFormatString")
062    private static final String UNMATCHED_CONSTRUCTOR_PARAMETERS =
063        "Instance factory '%s' could not match any parameter to any columns in the result set. "
064            + "Verify that the Java compiler is configured to emit parameter names, "
065            + "that your result set has the columns expected, annotate the "
066            + "parameter names explicitly with @ColumnName, or annotate nullable parameters as @Nullable";
067
068    @SuppressWarnings("InlineFormatString")
069    private static final String UNMATCHED_CONSTRUCTOR_PARAMETER =
070        "Instance factory '%s' parameter '%s' has no matching columns in the result set. "
071            + "Verify that the Java compiler is configured to emit parameter names, "
072            + "that your result set has the columns expected, annotate the "
073            + "parameter names explicitly with @ColumnName, or annotate nullable parameters as @Nullable";
074
075    /**
076     * Use the only declared constructor to map a class.
077     *
078     * @param clazz the class to find a constructor of
079     * @return the factory
080     */
081    public static RowMapperFactory factory(Class<?> clazz) {
082        return RowMapperFactory.of(clazz, ConstructorMapper.of(clazz));
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Use the only declared constructor to map a class.
087     *
088     * @param clazz the class to find a constructor of
089     * @param prefix a prefix for the parameter names
090     * @return the factory
091     */
092    public static RowMapperFactory factory(Class<?> clazz, String prefix) {
093        return RowMapperFactory.of(clazz, ConstructorMapper.of(clazz, prefix));
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * Use a {@code Constructor<T>} to map its declaring type.
098     *
099     * @param constructor the constructor to invoke
100     * @return the factory
101     */
102    public static RowMapperFactory factory(Constructor<?> constructor) {
103        return RowMapperFactory.of(constructor.getDeclaringClass(), ConstructorMapper.of(constructor));
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * Use a {@code Constructor<T>} to map its declaring type.
108     *
109     * @param constructor the constructor to invoke
110     * @param prefix a prefix to the constructor parameter names
111     * @return the factory
112     */
113    public static RowMapperFactory factory(Constructor<?> constructor, String prefix) {
114        return RowMapperFactory.of(constructor.getDeclaringClass(), ConstructorMapper.of(constructor, prefix));
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Return a ConstructorMapper for the given type.
119     *
120     * @param <T>  the type to map
121     * @param type the mapped type
122     * @return the mapper
123     */
124    public static <T> RowMapper<T> of(Class<T> type) {
125        return ConstructorMapper.of(type, DEFAULT_PREFIX);
126    }
127
128    /**
129     * Return a ConstructorMapper for the given type and prefix.
130     *
131     * @param <T>    the type to map
132     * @param type   the mapped type
133     * @param prefix the column name prefix
134     * @return the mapper
135     */
136    public static <T> RowMapper<T> of(Class<T> type, String prefix) {
137        return new ConstructorMapper<>(findFactoryFor(type), prefix);
138    }
139
140    /**
141     * Return a ConstructorMapper using the given constructor
142     *
143     * @param <T> the type to map
144     * @param constructor the constructor to be used in mapping
145     * @return the mapper
146     */
147    public static <T> RowMapper<T> of(Constructor<T> constructor) {
148        return ConstructorMapper.of(constructor, DEFAULT_PREFIX);
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Instantiate a ConstructorMapper using the given constructor and prefix
153     *
154     * @param <T> the type to map
155     * @param constructor the constructor to be used in mapping
156     * @param prefix      the column name prefix
157     * @return the mapper
158     */
159    public static <T> RowMapper<T> of(Constructor<T> constructor, String prefix) {
160        return new ConstructorMapper<>(new ConstructorInstanceFactory<>(constructor), prefix);
161    }
162
163    private final InstanceFactory<T> factory;
164    private final String prefix;
165    private final ConstructorProperties constructorProperties;
166    private final Map<Parameter, ConstructorMapper<?>> nestedMappers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
167
168    private ConstructorMapper(InstanceFactory<T> factory, String prefix) {
169        this.factory = factory;
170        this.prefix = prefix.toLowerCase();
171        this.constructorProperties = factory.getAnnotation(ConstructorProperties.class);
172    }
173
174    @Override
175    public T map(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
176        return specialize(rs, ctx).map(rs, ctx);
177    }
178
179    @Override
180    public RowMapper<T> specialize(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
181        final List<String> columnNames = getColumnNames(rs);
182        final List<ColumnNameMatcher> columnNameMatchers =
183                ctx.getConfig(ReflectionMappers.class).getColumnNameMatchers();
184        final List<String> unmatchedColumns = new ArrayList<>(columnNames);
185
186        RowMapper<T> mapper = specialize0(ctx, columnNames, columnNameMatchers, unmatchedColumns)
187            .orElseGet(() -> new UnmatchedConstructorMapper<>(format(
188                UNMATCHED_CONSTRUCTOR_PARAMETERS, factory)));
189
190        if (ctx.getConfig(ReflectionMappers.class).isStrictMatching()
191            && anyColumnsStartWithPrefix(unmatchedColumns, prefix, columnNameMatchers)) {
192
193            return new UnmatchedConstructorMapper<>(
194                format("Mapping instance factory %s could not match parameters for columns: %s", factory, unmatchedColumns));
195        }
196
197        return mapper;
198    }
199
200    private Optional<RowMapper<T>> specialize0(StatementContext ctx,
201                                               List<String> columnNames,
202                                               List<ColumnNameMatcher> columnNameMatchers,
203                                               List<String> unmatchedColumns) {
204        final int count = factory.getParameterCount();
205        final Parameter[] parameters = factory.getParameters();
206
207        boolean matchedColumns = false;
208        final List<String> unmatchedParameters = new ArrayList<>();
209        final List<ParameterData> paramData = new ArrayList<>();
210        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
211            final Parameter parameter = parameters[i];
212
213            boolean nullable = isNullable(parameter);
214            Nested anno = parameter.getAnnotation(Nested.class);
215            if (anno == null) {
216                final String paramName = prefix + paramName(parameters, i, constructorProperties);
217
218                final OptionalInt columnIndex = findColumnIndex(paramName, columnNames, columnNameMatchers,
219                    () -> debugName(parameter));
220
221                if (columnIndex.isPresent()) {
222                    int colIndex = columnIndex.getAsInt();
223                    final QualifiedType<?> type = QualifiedType.of(parameter.getParameterizedType())
224                        .withAnnotations(ctx.getConfig(Qualifiers.class).findFor(parameter));
225                    paramData.add(new ParameterData(i, parameter, ctx.findColumnMapperFor(type)
226                        .map(mapper -> new SingleColumnMapper<>(mapper, colIndex + 1))
227                        .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException(
228                            format("Could not find column mapper for type '%s' of parameter '%s' for instance factory '%s'", type, paramName, factory)))));
229
230                    matchedColumns = true;
231                    unmatchedColumns.remove(columnNames.get(colIndex));
232                } else if (nullable) {
233                    paramData.add(new ParameterData(i, parameter, (r, c) -> null));
234                } else {
235                    unmatchedParameters.add(paramName);
236                }
237            } else {
238                final String nestedPrefix = prefix + anno.value();
239
240                final Optional<? extends RowMapper<?>> nestedMapper = nestedMappers
241                    .computeIfAbsent(parameter, p ->
242                        new ConstructorMapper<>(findFactoryFor(p.getType()), nestedPrefix))
243                    .specialize0(ctx, columnNames, columnNameMatchers, unmatchedColumns);
244
245                if (nestedMapper.isPresent()) {
246                    paramData.add(new ParameterData(i, parameter, nestedMapper.get()));
247                    matchedColumns = true;
248                } else if (nullable) {
249                    paramData.add(new ParameterData(i, parameter, (r, c) -> null));
250                } else {
251                    unmatchedParameters.add(paramName(parameters, i, constructorProperties));
252                }
253            }
254        }
255
256        if (!matchedColumns) {
257            return Optional.empty();
258        }
259
260        paramData.sort(Comparator.comparing(
261            p -> p.propagateNull ? 1 : 0));
262
263        if (!unmatchedParameters.isEmpty()) {
264            throw new IllegalArgumentException(format(
265                UNMATCHED_CONSTRUCTOR_PARAMETER, factory, unmatchedParameters));
266        }
267
268        final Optional<String> nullMarkerColumn =
269                Optional.ofNullable(factory.getAnnotationIncludingType(PropagateNull.class))
270                    .map(PropagateNull::value);
271        return Optional.of((r, c) -> {
272            if (PojoMapper.propagateNull(r, nullMarkerColumn)) {
273                return null;
274            }
275            final Object[] params = new Object[count];
276
277            for (ParameterData p : paramData) {
278                params[p.index] = p.mapper.map(r, c);
279                if (p.propagateNull && (params[p.index] == null || (p.isPrimitive && r.wasNull()))) {
280                    return null;
281                }
282            }
283
284            return factory.newInstance(params);
285        });
286    }
287
288    private boolean isNullable(Parameter parameter) {
289        // Any annotation named @Nullable is honored. We're nice that way.
290        return Stream.of(parameter.getAnnotations())
291            .map(Annotation::annotationType)
292            .map(Class::getSimpleName)
293            .anyMatch("Nullable"::equals);
294    }
295
296    private static String paramName(Parameter[] parameters,
297                                    int position,
298                                    ConstructorProperties parameterNames) {
299        final Parameter parameter = parameters[position];
300        ColumnName dbName = parameter.getAnnotation(ColumnName.class);
301        if (dbName != null) {
302            return dbName.value();
303        }
304        if (parameterNames != null) {
305            return parameterNames.value()[position];
306        }
307        return parameter.getName();
308    }
309
310    private String debugName(Parameter parameter) {
311        return format("%s constructor parameter %s",
312            factory.getDeclaringClass().getSimpleName(),
313            parameter.getName());
314    }
315
316    private static class ParameterData {
317        ParameterData(int index, Parameter parameter, RowMapper<?> mapper) {
318            this.index = index;
319            this.parameter = parameter;
320            this.mapper = mapper;
321            propagateNull = parameter.getAnnotation(PropagateNull.class) != null;
322            isPrimitive = parameter.getType().isPrimitive();
323        }
324        final int index;
325        final Parameter parameter;
326        final RowMapper<?> mapper;
327        final boolean propagateNull;
328        final boolean isPrimitive;
329    }
330
331    static class UnmatchedConstructorMapper<T> implements RowMapper<T> {
332        private final String message;
333
334        UnmatchedConstructorMapper(String message) {
335            this.message = message;
336        }
337
338        @Override
339        public T map(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
340            throw new IllegalArgumentException(message);
341        }
342    }
343}
